00020 void Polymer::Initialize(){
00021     QMApplication::Initialize();
00023     AddProgramOptions("Polymer options")
00024     ("cutnrg", boost::program_options::value<double>(), "wavefunctions will be considered only if their eigenvalues are greater than the smallest one by this amount");
00025  
00026 }
00027 
00028 bool Polymer::EvaluateOptions(){
00029     QMApplication::EvaluateOptions();
00030     CheckRequired("cutnrg", "no energy cutoff given");
00031     _cutnrg = OptionsMap()["cutnrg"].as<double>();
00032 }

00034 bool Polymer::EvaluateFrame(){
00035     UpdatePolTop();
00036     string outn ("frame");
00037     outn = outn + lexical_cast<string> (_qmtop.getStep());
00038     Save(outn);
00039     Clean();
00040 }

00042 void Polymer::EndEvaluate(){
00043     
00044 }
00045 
00046 void Polymer::UpdatePolTop(){
00047     // 1) compute "wavefunction" for each molecule 
00048     MoleculeContainer::iterator itMol=_qmtop.Molecules().begin();
00049     
00050     for ( ; itMol!= _qmtop.Molecules().end(); ++itMol){
00051         CalcWaveFunction(*itMol);
00052     }
00053 
00054     
00055     // 2) create new neighbour list
00056     QMNBList &nblist = _qmtop.nblist();
00057     for(QMNBList::iterator iter = nblist.begin();iter!=nblist.end();++iter){
00058         CrgUnit * one = (*iter)->Crg1PBCCopy();
00059         CrgUnit * two = (*iter)->Crg2PBCCopy();
00060         //insert check for size of Js
00061         double J = ((*iter)->Js())[0];
00062         UpdateJs (one, two,J); // hard code that
00063                                // only one element is 
00064                                // considered (otherwise
00065                                // the whole method is doubtful)
00066     }
00067 
00068     // 3) now that the new neighbour list is there, compute the dr.
00069     map<PairWF, double>::iterator itpwf=_polJs.begin();
00070     for(;itpwf != _polJs.end(); ++itpwf){
00071         UpdatedR(itpwf->first);
00072     }
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 void Polymer::UpdateJs(CrgUnit * one, CrgUnit *two, const double & J){
00077 
00078     int mol1 = one->getMolId();
00079     int mol2 = two->getMolId();
00080     if (mol1 == mol2) {
00081         return;
00082     }
00083     vector <WaveFunction *>::iterator it1=_mstates[mol1]->begin();
00084     vector <WaveFunction *>::iterator it2=_mstates[mol2]->begin();
00085     map<int, int>::iterator itm1;
00086     map<int, int>::iterator itm2;
00087     itm1=_mcrg2bs.find(one->getId());
00088     itm2=_mcrg2bs.find(two->getId());
00089     if (itm1 == _mcrg2bs.end() || itm2 == _mcrg2bs.end() ){
00090         throw runtime_error ("could not find the crgunit in the index in UpdateJs");
00091     }
00092     for ( ; it1 != _mstates[mol1]->end(); ++it1){
00093         for ( ; it2 != _mstates[mol2]->end(); ++it2){
00094 
00095             double dJ = gsl_vector_get( (*it1)->_wf,  itm1->second) *
00096                         gsl_vector_get( (*it2)->_wf,  itm2->second) * J;
00097             map < PairWF , double >::iterator
00098               itJ = _polJs.find( make_pair(*it1, *it2));
00099             if (itJ == _polJs.end()){
00100                 _polJs.insert(make_pair (make_pair(*it1, *it2),dJ));
00101             }
00102             else {
00103                 itJ->second += dJ;
00104             }
00105 
00106         }
00107     }
00108 }
00109 
00110 void Polymer::CalcWaveFunction(Molecule * mol){
00111     int nbeads = mol->BeadCount();
00112     static int id=0;
00113     gsl_matrix * pH = gsl_matrix_calloc( nbeads, nbeads);
00114     double Jmax = 0.5;
00115     vector <WaveFunction *> * melement = new vector < WaveFunction *> ;
00116     _mstates.push_back( melement);
00117     
00118     //1 set diagonal elements
00119     for (int i=0; i< nbeads;i++){
00120         QMCrgUnit * crg = dynamic_cast<QMBead*>(mol->getBead(i))
00121             ->GetCrgUnit();
00122                 double nrg = crg->getTotalEnergy();
00123         gsl_matrix_set (pH,i,i, nrg);
00124         // set a map from CrgUnits -> the integer associated with them
00125         map<int, int>::iterator itm = _mcrg2bs.find(crg->getId());
00126         if (itm == _mcrg2bs.end()){
00127             _mcrg2bs.insert(make_pair(crg->getId(), i));
00128         }
00129         else {
00130             throw runtime_error ("each crgunit should only appeare once in CalcWaveFunction");
00131         }
00132         QMBead* tbead = dynamic_cast<QMBead*>(mol->getBead(i));
00133         if (tbead->getiPos() != 0 ){
00134             throw runtime_error("each qmbead should have ipos correpsonding to its pos in the molecule");
00135         }
00136     }
00137 
00138     //2 set offdiagonal elements
00139     // in principle it would be nice to do this via the interactions
00140     // but this is not copied/written in statesaver
00141     
00142     //InteractionContainer::iterator itC=mol->Interactions().begin();
00143     //for ( ;itC != mol->Interactions.end(); itC++){
00144     //}
00145     for (int i=0;i<nbeads-1;i++){
00146         int j = i+1;
00147         vec one;
00148         vec two;
00149         one = mol->getBead(i)->getU();
00150         two = mol->getBead(j)->getU();
00151         // this will change using the reverse polish notation object.
00152         // dribble dribble
00153         double J = Jmax * (one * two);
00154         gsl_matrix_set(pH, i,j, J);
00155         gsl_matrix_set(pH, j,i, J);
00156     }
00157 
00158     gsl_eigen_symmv_workspace * gslwork = gsl_eigen_symmv_alloc(nbeads);
00159     gsl_vector *eval = gsl_vector_alloc (nbeads);
00160     gsl_matrix *evec = gsl_matrix_alloc (nbeads, nbeads);
00161     gsl_eigen_symmv(pH,eval, evec,gslwork);
00162     gsl_eigen_symmv_sort (eval, evec, GSL_EIGEN_SORT_VAL_ASC);
00163     
00164     //for each evector make a new wavefunction
00165     for (int i=0;i<nbeads;i++){
00166         if ( gsl_vector_get(eval,i) < gsl_vector_get(eval,0) + _cutnrg ){
00167             gsl_vector * pv = gsl_vector_alloc (nbeads);
00168             gsl_vector_memcpy(pv, &(gsl_matrix_column(evec, i).vector) );
00169             
00170             WaveFunction * wf = new WaveFunction;
00171             wf->_molid  = mol->getId();
00172             wf->_wfid = i;
00173             wf->_nrg = gsl_vector_get(eval,i);
00174             wf->_id = id;
00175             wf->_wf = pv;
00176             _states.push_back(wf);
00177             melement->push_back(wf);
00178             //determine the position
00179             wf->_pos=vec(0.,0.,0.);
00180             for (int j=0;j<nbeads;j++){
00181                 wf->_pos += (gsl_vector_get(pv,j) * gsl_vector_get(pv,j)) *
00182                         (mol->getBead(j)->getPos());
00183             }
00184             id++;
00185         }
00186     }
00187 
00188     gsl_matrix_free(pH);
00189     gsl_matrix_free(evec);
00190     gsl_eigen_symmv_free(gslwork);
00191     gsl_vector_free(eval);
00192     
00193 }
00194 
00195 void Polymer::Save(string & outn){
00196     string outnrg = outn + string ("nrg.txt");
00197     ofstream  out;
00198     out.open(outnrg.c_str());
00199     vector <WaveFunction *>::iterator its = _states.begin();
00200     for (; its!=_states.end();its++ ){
00201         out << "mol id: " << (*its)->_molid
00202                 << " wf id: " << (*its)->_wfid
00203                 << " wf abs id: " << (*its)->_id
00204                 << " energy " << (*its)->_nrg << '\n';
00205     }
00206     out << endl;
00207     out.close();
00208 
00209     string outneigh = outn + string ("neigh.txt");
00210     out.open(outneigh.c_str());
00211     map < PairWF, double> ::iterator itJ = _polJs.begin();
00212     map < PairWF, vec> ::iterator itR = _poldR.begin();
00213     for (; itJ!= _polJs.end(); ++itJ, ++itR){
00214         out << " wf ids: " << ((itJ->first).first)->_id <<
00215                 " " << ((itJ->first).second)->_id <<
00216                 " J " << (itJ->second) <<
00217                 " dR " << (itR->second) <<'\n';
00218     }
00219     out.close();
00220 
00221 }
00222 
00223 void Polymer::Clean(){
00224     vector <WaveFunction *>::iterator its = _states.begin();
00225     for (; its!=_states.end();its++ ){
00226         gsl_vector_free((*its)->_wf);
00227         delete *its;
00228     }
00229     _states.clear();
00230     vector < vector < WaveFunction * > *>::iterator itms = _mstates.begin();
00231     for ( ; itms != _mstates.end(); ++itms){
00232         (*itms)->clear();
00233     }
00234     _mstates.clear();
00235     _polJs.clear();
00236     _poldR.clear();
00237     _mcrg2bs.clear();
00238 }
00239 
00240 void Polymer::UpdatedR(const PairWF & pwf){
00241     
00242     vec r1 = (pwf.first)->_pos;
00243     vec r2 =(pwf.second)->_pos;
00244     vec d = _qmtop.BCShortestConnection(r1, r2);
00245     _poldR.insert(make_pair(pwf, d));
00246     
00247 }

00249 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00250 
00251     Polymer pol_calc;
00252     return pol_calc.Exec(argc, argv);
00253 }
